# stopSpeaking(_:)

**Instance Method**

Stops the speaking of text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func stopSpeaking(_ sender: Any?)
```

## Parameters

- **sender**: The control sending the message; can be `nil`.

## Speaking text

- **startSpeaking(_:)**: Speaks the selected text, or all text if no selection.
